features.name: Authentication
features.description: OAuth login with Kakao, Naver, Google, Apple. Email/password signup. Session management via Supabase Auth.

features.name: Onboarding
features.description: Multi-step user profile setup including name, birth date, birth time, gender, and MBTI selection.

features.name: Home Dashboard
features.description: Main fortune dashboard with swipeable cards showing daily fortune, saju insights, weekly trends, and lucky items.

features.name: Fortune List
features.description: Catalog of 30+ fortune types including traditional saju, tarot, MBTI, compatibility, career, health, and more.

features.name: Traditional Saju Fortune
features.description: Korean traditional four pillars (사주팔자) fortune reading based on birth date and time.

features.name: Tarot Fortune
features.description: Interactive tarot card reading with multiple deck selections, card spreads, and AI-generated interpretations.

features.name: Compatibility Fortune
features.description: Two-person compatibility analysis including romantic, friendship, and work relationships.

features.name: MBTI Fortune
features.description: MBTI-based fortune reading with personality insights and compatibility analysis.

features.name: Love Fortune
features.description: Comprehensive love fortune with multi-step input form and detailed relationship predictions.

features.name: Career Coaching
features.description: AI-powered career guidance with market trends, growth roadmap, and action plans.

features.name: Daily Calendar Fortune
features.description: Calendar-based daily fortune with device calendar sync and event-specific predictions.

features.name: Face Reading Fortune
features.description: AI-powered face analysis with interactive face map and celebrity matching.

features.name: Premium & Payment
features.description: In-app purchases for premium subscription and token packages. Blur/unlock system for premium content.

features.name: Profile Management
features.description: User profile view and edit, saju details, fortune history, and settings.

features.name: Interactive Features
features.description: Engaging fortune experiences including dream interpretation, fortune cookie, psychology tests, and worry beads.

features.name: Trend Content
features.description: Trending content including balance games, ideal worldcup, and viral psychology tests.

features.name: Routing & Navigation
features.description: GoRouter-based navigation with 100+ routes, shell routes for bottom navigation, and deep link support.

features.name: State Management
features.description: Riverpod-based state management with StateNotifier pattern for user, fortune, token, and theme states.
